name: Space SHMUP Prototype
description:
How to play:

  • Shoot as many enemies as you can.
  • Grab the weapons power-ups of the same type to get more cannons.
  • Grab the shield power-ups to survive longer.

Available Power-Ups:

  • B: blaster, the weapon you start with, orange color.
  • S: spread, blue color.
  • O: shield, green color.

Controls:

  • WASD or Arrows to move the ship.
  • Space to shoot.
  • ESC to pause.
  • Based on the Apple Picker Prototype from the book "Introduction to Game Design, Prototyping and Development" by Jeremy Gibson.
